import pandas as pd

import requests

import plotly.express as px

import folium
from folium.plugins import MarkerCluster
source.b7b0c53f:
m = folium.Map(location=[25,0], tiles='Stamen Watercolor', zoom_start=2)

choropleth = folium.Choropleth(
    geo_data=country_json_data,
    name="choropleth",
    data=df,
    columns=["Code", "Premium_USD"],
    key_on="feature.properties.ISO_A2",
    fill_color="YlOrRd",
    fill_opacity=0.7,
    line_opacity=0.4,
    legend_name="Netflix (Premium USD)",
).add_to(m)

folium.LayerControl().add_to(m)

choropleth.geojson.add_child(folium.features.GeoJsonTooltip(['premium_usd'], labels=False))

m
source.f6d64824:
fig_bar = px.bar(data_frame=df.nlargest(10, 'Premium_USD'),
                 x='Country', y='Premium_USD', color='Premium_USD', text='Premium_USD')
fig_bar.update_traces(marker=dict(line=dict(color='#000000', width=2)))
fig_bar.update_layout(title_text='Most Expensive Netflix price',
                      title_x=0.5, title_font=dict(size=30))
fig_bar.update_traces(texttemplate='%{text:.3s}', textposition='outside')
fig_bar.show()
source.6a0255ce:
fig_bar = px.bar(data_frame=df.nsmallest(10, 'Premium_USD'),
                 x='Country', y='Premium_USD', color='Premium_USD', text='Premium_USD')
fig_bar.update_traces(marker=dict(line=dict(color='#000000', width=2)))
fig_bar.update_layout(title_text='Cheapest Netflix prices',
                      title_x=0.5, title_font=dict(size=30))
fig_bar.update_traces(texttemplate='%{text:.3s}', textposition='outside')
fig_bar.show()
